It All Starts At Yes
Spring is here, which means it's time to get ready for the summer of a lifetime:
What's it all about?
For a taster of what you can experience on the programme, take a look at this video from an NCS graduate.
Some lucky grads from last year also had the chance to go to NCS Yes Live at Brixton Academy earlier this month with performances from Ellie Ingram, Joel Compass, Neon Jungle and Nina Nesbitt.
Catch up on what happened - watch the highlights.
